unnormalised: Oi, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, 'cause the Indian automotive scene is buzzing!
normalised: Hello, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian automotive scene is buzzing!

unnormalised: First off, Mahindra just dropped the new Scorpio-N Adventure Edition near Pune. Heard its off-roading capabilities are legit, tackling even the roughest ghat roads.
normalised: First off, Mahindra just dropped the new Scorpio-N Adventure Edition near Pune. Heard its off-roading capabilities are legitimate, tackling even the roughest ghat roads.

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled the Altroz Racer, a souped-up version of the Altroz, at the Buddh International Circuit. Expect some serious competition in the hatchback segment.
normalised: Then, Tata Motors unveiled the Altroz Racer, a souped-up version of the Altroz, at the Buddh International Circuit. Expect some serious competition in the hatchback segment.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki is teasing a new compact SUV, codenamed 'YFG', speculated to rival the Hyundai Creta. Word on the street is it'll be hitting showrooms around Diwali.
normalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki is teasing a new compact S U V, codenamed 'Y F G', speculated to rival the Hyundai Creta. Word on the street is it will be hitting showrooms around Diwali.

unnormalised: Don't forget the electric revolution! Ola Electric is expanding its Gigafactory in Tamil Nadu, aiming for a production capacity that could power half the country! The new expansion spans over a massive 100 sq ft.
normalised: Don't forget the electric revolution! Ola Electric is expanding its Gigafactory in Tamil Nadu, aiming for a production capacity that could power half the country! The new expansion spans over a massive one hundred square feet.

unnormalised: And, Bajaj Auto is reportedly working on an updated version of the Chetak e-scooter, with a longer range, targeting the young crowd in metros. Dr. Sharma from IIT Madras gave it a thumbs up after early testing.
normalised: And, Bajaj Auto is reportedly working on an updated version of the Chetak e-scooter, with a longer range, targeting the young crowd in metros. Doctor Sharma from I I T Madras gave it a thumbs up after early testing.

unnormalised: Pricing details are still under wraps for most, but rumors suggest starting prices around Rs. 8 lakhs. Letâ€™s see if they deliver on the 'paisa vasool' promise! Stay tuned for more updates.
normalised: Pricing details are still under wraps for most, but rumors suggest starting prices around rupee eight lakhs. Let us see if they deliver on the 'paisa vasool' promise! Stay tuned for more updates.
